summary: Memory card-matching game with progressive difficulty; planning to expand from 3 difficulty modes to 10 increasing levels and add a completion reward.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Achievement badge emblem illustration, gold medal with ribbon and subtle sparkle on a transparent background (completion-badge.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the current 3-option difficulty system (easy/medium/hard) with a 10-level progression system (Level 1–Level 10) where each level increases difficulty by increasing the number of pairs and adjusting the grid layout accordingly.

Add level progression UX: when a player completes a level, show a clear call-to-action to continue to the next level (Levels 1–9) and a distinct completion state on Level 10 indicating the full game run is complete.

Wire frontend completion events to the backend so that when an authenticated user completes a level, the app records that completion and reflects persisted progress in the UI; if the user is not logged in, the UI should clearly prompt them to log in with Internet Identity to save progress.

Add frontend UI to claim the completion badge: after Level 10 is completed (and/or when persisted progress indicates all levels are complete), show a “Mint Badge” button for authenticated users, display minting status, and show a “Badge minted” state once successful.
Add a badge image asset and render it as part of the “Badge minted”/completion UI (static asset served from the frontend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Expand game progression to 10 levels with increasing difficulty
Add a mintable badge reward for users who complete all levels

Implement backend persistence for per-user level progress using Internet Identity principals, including: reading current progress, recording a completed level, and checking whether all 10 levels are completed.

Add a mintable completion badge: implement a backend “mint badge” action that can only be performed by a user who has completed all 10 levels, and store a persistent minted-badge record for that user.

projectName: Expand Memory Match to 10 progressive levels and add mintable completion badge
